items.sentence: I told you I couldn\'t be trusted with secrets.
Tom apologized to Mary for his son\'s rudeness.
Don\'t say anything to Tom about what happened.
The hotels along the beach have been evacuated.
The hunting dogs followed the scent of the fox.
Tom hates it here, but he tries not to show it.
Tom heard Mary play the piano not too long ago.
Why don\'t you talk directly to Tom about that?
I have the feeling that my French is improving.
You don\'t have to leave if you don\'t want to.
I wonder what Tom ate for his Christmas dinner.
Should we tell Tom he doesn\'t need to do that?
I wish I\'d never told Tom about what happened.
I wish Mary\'s father would let me talk to her.
I just thought you might want to eat something.
I just want you to know that I really love you.
I knocked on the door, but there was no answer.
I know that Tom has already left for Australia.
I told Tom that he shouldn\'t drink that water.
Every room in my house has two or more windows.
